There is more crime than ever on the streets and with the cut backs on police officers and PCSO's there is not enough law enforcement on the streets to deal with unsociable behaviour such as Riots, Robberys, neighbourhood complaints.
We also have issues on public transport which is not dealt with and could do with police on public transport to ensure safety of the public.

The government need to step up and employ more police to keep our streets safe as most people do not feel safe in their own environment which is not ON !!!

Sign this petition if you agree we need more police officers to attend crime and more police on the beat to make our country safe!
